segments.text: I look around this kitchen and see what seems like an ordinary day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the overflowing water hints at a brewing problem, an unnoticed disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is so engrossed that nothing can break her concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's alarming how oblivious she is to the children’s antics just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering on that stool, and a part of me holds my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the cookies calling out to him, sweet and irresistible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful stance only adds to my concern, like a co-conspirator in a risk-filled venture.
segments.speaker: PAR
